headline.main: RELEASE OF POMARET IS REVEALED IN VICHY; Ex-Ministers and Plane Makers Sent to Southern France

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, March 2 -- The French press is only now allowed to report the provisional release from "administrative interment" of Charles Pomaret and Abraham Schrameck, both former Ministers and both prominent members of the former Radical Socialist party.
abstract: War guilt trial; Vichy press reveals release of C Pomaret and A Schrameck; others released

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
